page.title: 15HOUSING IN THE BROUGH AREA
page.content: IN THE VILLAGE THERE ARE LOTS OF DIFFERENT STYLES OF HOUSES WHICH ARE BIG AND SOLID.THERE ARE LOTS OF COUNCIL HOUSES DOWN CROFT CLOSE AND SIX BUNGALOWS. AT HELBECK THERE ARE TWO FARMS AND ONE HOUSE AND A MANSION.ON HELBECK ROAD THERE ARE BUNGALOWS AND COUNCIL HOUSES. CHURCH BROUGH HOUSES ARE MAINLY OLD BUT THERE ARE NEW BUNGALOWS.IN CHURCH BROUGH THERE ARE TWO FARM HOUSES IN FLITHOLME THERE ARE TWO FARM HOUSES ONE BUNGALOW ONE HOUSE AND ONE BUSINESS. THAT IS A TRACTOR FIRM. IN MUSGRAVE THERE IS ONE SHOP AND SOME FARMS. THE SCHOOL WAS BUILT IN 1928 AND CLOSED THREE YEARS AGO.THE STATION HOUSE IN MUSGRAVE IS AT THE SIDE OF THE RAILWAY LINE AND IS NOW A PRIVATE HOUSE CALLED BEECH_INGS.
